div.a: How Vegas Casinos Wage A War On Cheating

div.div: Today, when every smartphone is a computer, camera, and communications device, the potential for cheating is probably greater than it's ever been. But the casinos are fighting back with technology of their own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYZoYo&via=Digg&text=How Vegas Casinos Wage A War On Cheating

div.div: Lance Armstrong confessed during an interview Monday with Oprah Winfrey that he used performance-enhancing drugs to win the Tour de France, a person familiar with the situation told The Associated Press.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xzn0Dr&via=Digg&text=Armstrong Admits Doping

div.a: Clarence Thomas Breaks Six Years Of Silence

div.div: Around 11:45 on Monday morning, Justice Clarence Thomas broke almost seven years of silence during Supreme Court arguments. But it was not entirely clear what he said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TW4o10&via=Digg&text=Clarence Thomas Breaks Six Years Of Silence

div.a: How To Never Do The Things You Hate Ever Again

div.div: You don't need to be rich to have an assistant. Or even employed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/a1YkS8&via=Digg&text=How To Never Do The Things You Hate Ever Again

div.a: 3D-Printed 30-Round AR Magazine Brings Us Ever Closer To A Fully 3D-Printed Gun

div.div: If you’re a fan of a science fiction or perhaps a post-apocalyptic future where roving gangs overthrow traditional government because it’s so easy to get weapons, you might be following the progress of the first fully 3D printed gun.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVI8Eq&via=Digg&text=3D-Printed 30-Round AR Magazine Brings Us Ever Closer To A Fully 3D-Printed Gun

div.a: The Top Trending Baby Names For 2013

div.div: Naming your baby is the first major decision you make for your babe, but how do you choose?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYZPlp&via=Digg&text=The Top Trending Baby Names For 2013

div.div: Guerrilla map designers create and install their own metro maps in #Moscow subway transitmaps.tumblr.com/post/40... via @scottburnham

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X5oQKj&via=Digg&text=Map-Bombing Moscow's Metro

div.a: Exploding Paint Cans With Fireworks In Slow Motion

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X8xebM&via=Digg&text=Exploding Paint Cans With Fireworks In Slow Motion

div.a: Delta's New iPad App Shows Off The World Below Your Plane

div.div: Glass Bottom Jet allows users aboard Delta’s wifi equipped planes to watch the ground pass below as they speed through the sky.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13woNg3&via=Digg&text=Delta's New iPad App Shows Off The World Below Your Plane

div.a: Woman Drives For 900 Miles Instead Of 90 Thanks To GPS Error

div.div: I've read plenty of crazy GPS stories, but this has to be the craziest of them all: a 67-year-old woman drove for 900 miles over the course of two days because of a GPS error combined with her complete lack of attention. Her actual destination was only 90 miles away.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13vYfwa&via=Digg&text=Woman Drives For 900 Miles Instead Of 90 Thanks To GPS Error

div.a: The Largest Human Gathering In History

div.div: Imagine squeezing the populations of Shanghai, New York City and another 7 or so of the world's most populous cities into 20 square kilometers, and you'll get some idea of how big a gathering Kumbh Mela will be.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WTtpqp&via=Digg&text=The Largest Human Gathering In History

div.div: Almost 60 years after the end of the Korean War, the DMZ is still the deadliest border on the planet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V5Ons3&via=Digg&text=The Deadliest Border On Earth

div.a: You've Been Scrolling Wrong The Whole Time

div.div: MagicScroll, a free bookmarklet, turns any website into a flippable ebook. It feels strange at first — but then it clicks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uke5oF&via=Digg&text=You've Been Scrolling Wrong The Whole Time

div.a: When A TV Police Chase Shows Up On Your Yard

div.div: The best high-speed police chase you'll see this week. Or at least today (it's only Monday, after all).

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZQnyo1&via=Digg&text=When A TV Police Chase Shows Up On Your Yard

div.a: Why It's Hopeless To Think You Can Out-Trade An Alogrithm

div.div: It took algorithms just 4 seconds to process and trade on news that Dell was going private.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X8J062&via=Digg&text=Why It's Hopeless To Think You Can Out-Trade An Alogrithm

div.div: JUDGE FEARS RULING, SO NOBODY WINS

div.a: Teacher Claims Discrimination Over Fear Of Kids

div.div: A longtime French and Spanish high school teacher is suing the Mariemont school district, alleging it discriminated against her because she has a disability – she has a phobia of young children.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10p2j2G&via=Digg&text=Teacher Claims Discrimination Over Fear Of Kids

div.a: CBS Forced CNET Staff To Recast Vote After Hopper Won 'Best In Show' At CES

div.div: According to sources familiar with the matter, the Hopper was not simply an entrant in the Best of CES awards for the site: it was actually chosen as the winner of the "Best of Show" award (as voted by CNET's editorial staff).

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYW2EN&via=Digg&text=CBS Forced CNET Staff To Recast Vote After Hopper Won 'Best In Show' At CES

div.div: THE TRUTH WILL SET YOU FREE

div.a: Columnist: I Was Deluded To Believe Lance Armstrong When He Denied Doping

div.div: In August, columnist Buzz Bissinger penned a Newsweek cover story entitled, "I Still Believe in Lance Armstrong." In October, the Armstrong myth came tumbling down. Now, Bissinger has a powerful mea culpa.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XxXBdn&via=Digg&text=Columnist: I Was Deluded To Believe Lance Armstrong When He Denied Doping

div.a: The Wall Street Journal Has A Bedbug Problem

div.div: Wall Street Journal employees began their day this morning with a bit of a headscratcher. (More of a head-to-toe scratcher, really.)

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5Jr7h&via=Digg&text=The Wall Street Journal Has A Bedbug Problem

div.div: BECAUSE YOU ALREADY LOOK DOWN ON OTHERS

div.a: Looking Down On Other People's Living Spaces

div.div: Photographer Menno Aden likes to look down on his subjects, but in about the least pretentious way possible. To him, it’s just another way of seeing someone’s personality.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVGsL4&via=Digg&text=Looking Down On Other People's Living Spaces

div.a: Guns Don't Kill People, Gun Culture Does

div.div: As the debate over gun control deteriorates into shouting matches and threats of insurrection, most of the rest of the world looks on with confusion, viewing America’s gun culture and laws as sad and odd.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11ts3Km&via=Digg&text=Guns Don't Kill People, Gun Culture Does

div.a: Space Station To Test $17M Inflatable Room

div.div: NASA will use the Bigelow Expandable Activity Module to determine the benefits of inflatables for exploration and commercial space work. We suspect the astronauts just want an enormous bouncy castle for the laughs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VaqqNh&via=Digg&text=Space Station To Test $17M Inflatable Room

div.a: Watch This Army Of 21 Snow Plows Team Up To Clear A Highway

div.div: You'd imagine that it would take quite a few plows to clear a snow-covered highway, but not quite this many.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13tAX9a&via=Digg&text=Watch This Army Of 21 Snow Plows Team Up To Clear A Highway

div.div: Disguises, pseudonyms and Hitler's salute were all part of one man's secret mission to infiltrate Europe’s far-right scene.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TV3lyk&via=Digg&text=Undercover With The Neo-Nazis

div.div: This year's flu season is the worst in recent history. Here's what you need to know.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RRA5sr&via=Digg&text=The Flu, Explained

div.div: LOOK FOR AN UNUSUALLY LARGE PATTY

div.a: The Definition Of A Pub Burger

div.div: In the taxonomy of burgers, the so-called pub burger is the latest variant to have its moment in the sun. But what the hell is it, anyway? Burger Business decided to parse various definitions and seek out 24 examples of pub burgers—inspired, vaguely, by the English—on menus across the country.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VZHZOA&via=Digg&text=The Definition Of A Pub Burger

div.a: How Air Pollution In China Has Hit Previously Unimaginable Levels

div.div: Air pollution in China is worse than it has ever been before. Here's how it got so bad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TV9D0P&via=Digg&text=How Air Pollution In China Has Hit Previously Unimaginable Levels

div.div: A guide to how Gandalf deals with problems in Middle Earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WxSQhj&via=Digg&text=How Gandalf Solves Problems

div.a: How To Fix Every Common Zipper Problem

div.div: Zippers haven't changed much since they were first invented, and neither have the problems we all have with them. From stuck zippers to teeth that just won't clinch, here's how to fix all the problems you'll run into with anything that zips.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XybXuj&via=Digg&text=How To Fix Every Common Zipper Problem

div.div: STILL THE GALAXY'S WORST DAD THOUGH

div.a: How Star Wars Might've Had A Different Darth Vader

div.div: George Lucas may have considered offering the role of Darth Vader to someone completely different.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XxSNEW&via=Digg&text=How Star Wars Might've Had A Different Darth Vader

div.div: NOT THOSE BRAZILIANS. NOT THOSE CRABS

div.a: Brazilians Have Made Crabs An Endangered Species

div.div: Pubic lice, the crab-shaped insects that have dwelled in human groins since the beginning of history, are disappearing. Doctors say bikini waxing may be the reason.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYWuC9&via=Digg&text=Brazilians Have Made Crabs An Endangered Species
